name: S228 – TAPE PRIMER AND ADHESION PROMOTER
full_name: S228 – TAPE PRIMER AND ADHESION PROMOTER
description: ForzaBOND™ S228 is a primer to increase adhesive performance.
applications: Increases adhesion with high bond tapes and other adhesives.
Improves adhesion on polyethylene, polypropylene, glass, metal and painted surfaces.
benefits: Increases adhesive performance on polyethylene, polypropylene and TPR
Also useful on other plastics, rubber & metals
Removes grease and oils to promote adhesion
howToUse: Forzabond® S228 should be well-shaken before use. Ensure the bonding surfaces are clean and dry before application.
Apply a thin, even coat to the surface to be bonded using the minimum needed to attain a full coat.
Allow to dry thoroughly (about 5 minutes at room temperature) before applying adhesive.
Porous surfaces may require two applications of primer – allow first coat to dry before applying a second.
S228 may be applied by brush, swab or rag.
Store S228 in original container; transfer only a small amount into work vessel for use.
